  • NFL STATS 1

    “Scraping and cleaning data from Pro-Football-Reference.com”

    This series will use historical data from NFL seasons between 1992 and 2016 to illustrate some data munging, analysis, and visualization techniques in R. American football is particularly suited to analysis because of its stop / reset / start structure, the singular focus of every play (one pass, one run, one kick etc.), and the strictly defined...
